title: Eleven Madison Park's Granola
full_text:
Eleven Madison Park's Granola
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
40 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
45 mins
Serves
12 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2 3/4
cups
rolled oats
1
cup
shelled pistachios
1/3
cup
raw pumpkin seeds
1
cup
unsweetened coconut chips
or flakes (not shredded coconut)
1
tablespoon
salt
1/2
cup
light brown sugar
1/3
cup
extra-virgin olive oil
1/3
cup
maple syrup
, preferably Grade B
3/4
cup
dried sour cherries
Directions
Preheat oven to 300°F (150°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a medium bowl, mix together oats, pistachios, pumpkin seeds, coconut chips, and salt.
In a small saucepan, combine brown sugar, olive oil, and maple syrup. Bring heat to medium and whisk occasionally until sugar has dissolved. Pour over oat mixture.
Spread oat mixture on prepared baking sheet. Bake until lightly golden, about 40 minutes. Remove from oven and mix in dried cherries.
Special Equipment
Rimmed baking sheet
,
parchment paper
